IS457

This is the course website for Data Storytelling, instructed by Jill Naiman (jnaiman@illinois.edu).

Below, you will find the materials for each week, as well as the syllabus that includes contact information and a course outline.

Lectures and Materials

This course developed by Matthew Turk at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign School of Information Sciences. The source code is released under a BSD 3-Clause license, allowing for reuse and redistribution.
